abstract: Some analysts wonder, however, if the company missed an opportunity for greater sales with the timing of its release for the Christmas but not the Thanksgiving season.
snippet: Some analysts wonder, however, if the company missed an opportunity for greater sales with the timing of its release for the Christmas but not the Thanksgiving season.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  The highly publicized video game Epic Mickey, which showcases the Walt Disney Company’s central character in an unusually dark manner, had a solid but not spectacular debut in stores  a likely reflection, analysts said, of a release strategy that missed important retail opportunities.

headline.main: Epic Mickey Sales Please Disney, Despite Late Start
headline.print_headline: Epic Mickey Sales Please Disney, Despite Late Start
